entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Feature] `SecureStorage.GetOrSetAsync(key, value?)` #27966
  • [iOS] CollectionView 1's doesn't adjust its offset when resizing a footer #27962
  • [Windows, Android] Toggling Header/Footer in CollectionView Dynamically is not working #27959
  • [MacCatalyst] Picker control Focused and Unfocused events does not trigger whether focusing manually or programmatically. #27957
  • [iOS, Catalyst] ScrollPosition changes when updating the ItemsLayout from Grid to Linear layout in CV1 #27955
  • HybridWebView throwing exceptions in Windows even with simplest configuration (causing crashes) #27954
  • HybridWebView crashing every time in Windows now with 8.0.40 update #27953
  • [Android] Layout was hidden when the keyboard appeared for the below ScrollView's Entry content. #27952
  • [Android] Keyboard covers content at bottom of screen in a ScrollView #27951
  • [Windows] RightToLeft is not working for Shell #27947
  • [Windows] CollectionView ItemsLayout does not update while switch from LinearItemsLayout to GridItemsLayout #27946
  • .NET MAUI IOS Collection view selection colour is Grey when we navigate to other page and come back again. #27945
  • new Couchbase.Lite.Database() throws an DllNotFoundException when built for iOS Release target #27944
  • HybridWebView can not load .js.map file. #27943

Closed

  • Selective Exception breakpoints do not work properly #27934
  • Firing OnNavigating is blocked when using extended TabBar (tabbar with more than 5 tabs) (iOS) #27964
  • Maui ios device theme vice splashscreen background #27909
    Backlog
  • Splash screen image is not displayed after installation. #20005
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [ci] Move more runs to Sequoia #27972
    area-infrastructure
  • [Accessibility] Add Accessibility Traits to CollectionView items on iOS/Catalyst #27971
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR5
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #27970
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 16 #27968
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10 #27967
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 15 #27965
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] CollectionView 1's doesn't adjust its offset when resizing a footer #27963
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fix the FilePicker.PickMultipleAsync() Not Returning Null When Canceled #27961
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview1] Update more preview1 versions #27956
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview1
  • Enable nullability annotations for `ShadowTypeConverter` #27950
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fixed an issue where an Editor with a small height inside a ScrollView would cause the entire page to scroll #27948
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [Android] Testcase for Shell FlowDirection issue #27931
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [ci] Remove conditions for devdiv #27958
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #27942
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview1] Update sdk and aspnet versions #27926
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add converters to DatePicker and TimePicker for DateOnly and TimeOnly #21989
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [PERFORMANCE][SECURITY] Refactored Regex to cached (static readonly, Compiled, source generated, with timeout for security) #26095
    area-architecture
  • Fix CSS Hot Reload - Handle fingerprint when hot reloading scoped CSS bundles #27788
    area-tooling
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20250219211456120 to main #27915
    area-localization, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix CSS Hot Reload on iOS device #27812
    area-tooling
  • Applying visibility change to child controls #20154
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-general, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 14 #27906
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Adding some copilot instructions #27864
  • [Android] Shell Navigation to a page without a Tabbar #27779
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • remove Dispose call on ShellItemRenderer #27890
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed Navigation Toolbar Visibility Issue on Dynamic Flyout Reset in FlyoutPage. #26693
    community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Nullable TimePicker (make Time nullable) #27930
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • Fixed the CollectionView scroll the content inside Editor when tapping to get focus on it #27851
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Essentials] Functionality to check if GPS/Location is enabled #27941
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, area-essentials, community ✨, essentials-geolocation
  • [android] move `IsDispatchRequiredImplementation()` to Java #27936
    .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 2 #27500
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 13 #27904
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix gesture crash navigating #19517
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, stale, area-gestures
  • [Testing] Empowering UITests with AI #27929
    do-not-merge, area-testing, area-ai
  • [Testing] Add Appium capabilities to speed up tests #27371
    area-testing
  • [Android] Fix crash starting the swipe on SwipeView inside CollectionView #27669
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-swipeview
  • [Windows] Fix "PlatformView cannot be null here" Exception using VisualStates #27877
    t/bug, area-xaml, platform/windows 🪟
  • [Testing] Add VerifyScreenshot method overrides to verify a specific element #27632
    do-not-merge, area-testing
  • Fixed - Grouped CollectionView items not rendered properly on Android, works on Windows #27847
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Buttons with Gradient and ImageSource at the same time: ImageSource doesn't appear - fix #27572
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Fixed ImageButton not honoring Padding value. #26785
    community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Windows] - Handle Dynamic Updates for CanDrag and AllowDrop in Drag and Drop Gesture #27845
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the FlyoutPage.Flyout Disappearing When Maximizing the Window on Mac Platform #26701
    area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #27888
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-dialogalert, area-controls-dialog, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [Testing] Re-enable test Issue18193 on MacCatalyst #27892
    area-testing, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 3 #27905
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS][Shell][More Tab] Navigation from the 'More' tab - improvements #27932
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 9 #27743
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Publish new snapshots and diffs to a specific artifacts folder #27928
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 10 #27751
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed Shadow not updated when Clipping a View with a shadow #27873
    platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 1 #27695
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 4 #27561
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix for Flyout Menu Backdrop Area does not Readjust on Orientation Change #27700
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-flyout, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 12 #27804
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 11 #27764
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] - Fix Custom FlyoutIcon from Being Overridden to Default Color in Shell #27580
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Bump appium #27939
  • Fix for CarouselView doesnot scroll corresponding to ItemsUpdatingScrollMode when collection modified #26608
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Fix flaky tests 6 #27874
    area-testing, testing-flakiness
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for Shadows #27701
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Testing] Updated FlakyTestAttribute to allow retries #27772
    area-testing, testing-flakiness
  • [Testing] Run tests verifying snapshots on mac now that's possible #27893
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Android] Fix for WebView Fails to Load URLs with Certain Encoded Characters #27003
    community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion
